glosses: To develop creases, folds, or wrinkles on a surface.

examples.translation: The shirt got wrinkled in the bag.
Her skin wrinkled more as she aged.

glosses: To become strained, complicated or tense.

examples.text: Yeni gelen kurallar yüzünden işler kırıştı.
examples.translation: Things got complicated because of the new rules.
The atmosphere became tense because of what was said in the meeting.

glosses: reciprocal of kırmak: to mutually break, damage, or destroy one another.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish قیرشمق. Equivalent to kır- + -ış.
